items.sentence: Tom should\'ve told Mary why she needed to do that.
Why don\'t we eat out at a restaurant for a change?
Why don\'t you ever take me with you on your trips?
Why don\'t you tell me a little bit about yourself?
Women don\'t wear dresses as often as they used to.
You must be blind as a bat if you couldn\'t see it.
How can you tell who\'s innocent and who\'s guilty?
I think we shouldn\'t tell Tom about what happened.
I think we\'re going to ask Tom to help us do that.
Tom couldn\'t remember what he had intended to say.
